description: Metadata for an atom probe tomography or field ion microscopy experiment.

metaInfos.description: String identifier aka name of the repository where the raw data to the experiment is available
metaInfos.name: experiment_typpe

metaInfos.description: String identifier aka name of the repository where the raw data to the experiment is available
metaInfos.name: data_repository_name

metaInfos.description: URL of this repository
metaInfos.name: where

metaInfos.description: Thumbnail image informing about the experiment
metaInfos.name: data_preview_url

metaInfos.description: Shape of the None/Null object
metaInfos.name: none_shape

metaInfos.description: Full name of the experimental method in use
metaInfos.name: experiment_method

metaInfos.description: Name of the city and country the experiment took place, format 'Country, City'
metaInfos.name: experiment_location

metaInfos.description: Name of the institution hosting the experimental facility
metaInfos.name: experiment_facility_institution

metaInfos.description: Name of the equipment, instrument with which the experiment was performed e.g. LEAP5000XS
metaInfos.name: experiment_tool_info

metaInfos.description: UTC start time of the experiment, format 'DD.MM.YYYY - HH.MM.SS'
metaInfos.name: experiment_date_global_start

metaInfos.description: UTC end time of the experiment, format 'DD.MM.YYYY - HH.MM.SS'
metaInfos.name: experiment_date_global_end

metaInfos.description: Local start time of the experiment, format 'DD.MM.YYYY - HH.MM.SS'
metaInfos.name: experiment_date_local_start

metaInfos.description: Operation mode of the instrument (APT, FIM or combination)
metaInfos.name: experiment_operation_method

metaInfos.description: Pulsing method to enforce a controlled ion evaporation sequence
metaInfos.name: experiment_imaging_method

metaInfos.description: Sample description e.g. pure W wire samples trial 2
metaInfos.name: specimen_description

metaInfos.description: Number of elements (disjoint element names) expected
metaInfos.name: number_of_elements

metaInfos.description: List of periodic table names expected contained in dataset
metaInfos.name: specimen_chemistry

metaInfos.description: Qualitative type of specimen and microstructure analyzed (e.g. thin films, nano objects, single crystal, polycrystal)
metaInfos.name: specimen_microstructure

metaInfos.description: Qualitative information how many phases in the specimen
metaInfos.name: specimen_constitution

metaInfos.description: Number of ions successfully evaporated
metaInfos.name: measured_number_ions_evaporated

metaInfos.description: Detector hit positions x and y
metaInfos.name: measured_detector_hit_pos

metaInfos.description: Detector hit multiplicity
metaInfos.name: measured_detector_hit_mult

metaInfos.description: Detector number of dead pulses
metaInfos.name: measured_detector_dead_pulses

metaInfos.description: Raw ion time of flight
metaInfos.name: measured_time_of_flight

metaInfos.description: Standing voltage
metaInfos.name: measured_standing_voltage

metaInfos.description: Pulse voltage
metaInfos.name: measured_pulse_voltage
